American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like,` What just happened?'?
